p.d: On her arrival in Lima, Corrine Studer meets not only her mother, but all her brothers and sisters. She wants to know where and how she would have lived if she hadn't come to Switzerland. An opportunity to discover Machu Picchu, the Amazonian forest and Cusco, the famous Andean city. Directed by: Adrian Schmon, Olivier Roth, Karen Ballmer (season 1, Switzerland, 2018)
